critical_discoveries.title: JavaScript Navigation Override Issue
critical_discoveries.description: streamlined-header.js was clearing HTML navigation and replacing with old 3-link version on DOMContentLoaded
critical_discoveries.symptoms: Page flashes new navigation then reverts to old navigation
critical_discoveries.root_cause: JavaScript innerHTML replacement overriding static HTML

critical_discoveries.title: Navigation Consistency Standards
critical_discoveries.description: Standardized 7-link navigation: Subjects | Unit Plans | Lessons | Handouts | Games | Platforms | AI Search
critical_discoveries.implementation: Static HTML in header with class='active' for current page
critical_discoveries.benefits: Exposes 4 revolutionary platforms and GraphRAG search from all pages

critical_discoveries.title: Firebase Authentication Domain Issue
critical_discoveries.description: Firebase project domain tuitrader.firebaseapp.com returns 'Site Not Found'
critical_discoveries.solution_needed: Create new Firebase project with working domain

critical_discoveries.title: Y8 Systems Unit Quality Benchmark
critical_discoveries.description: Y8 Systems unit has superior structure: lesson sequencing, cultural integration, assessment frameworks
critical_discoveries.recommendation: Use y8-systems/ structure as template for improving other units

critical_discoveries.title: Agent Knowledge Update Protocol Not Followed
critical_discoveries.description: AGENT_KNOWLEDGE_BASE.md specifies 'GraphRAG Update' after completing work but agents are not following this protocol
critical_discoveries.consequence: Institutional knowledge not persisting between sessions
critical_discoveries.solution: Implement systematic knowledge graph updates using neo4j_loader_official.py

next_agent_priorities: Finish remaining unit page navigation standardization
Set up new Firebase project for authentication
Create systematic GraphRAG knowledge update workflow
